sectionDescriptions.admin: Complete administrative interface with full system control, user management, advanced settings and real-time monitoring.
sectionDescriptions.dashboard: Main dashboard with real-time metrics, interactive charts, important KPIs and data visualizations for decision making.
sectionDescriptions.create: Creation and development process, showing the tools used, applied methodologies and implemented workflow.
sectionDescriptions.login: Secure authentication system with multiple login methods, password recovery and permission-based access control.
sectionDescriptions.mobile: Optimized mobile version with responsive design, intuitive gestures and experience adapted for mobile devices.
sectionDescriptions.desktop: Desktop interface with advanced features, keyboard shortcuts and layout optimized for productivity on large screens.
sectionDescriptions.web: Responsive web version with cross-browser compatibility, optimized performance and modern web resources.
sectionDescriptions.backend: Robust backend architecture with RESTful APIs, microservices, database and scalable infrastructure.
sectionDescriptions.database: Optimized database structure with relationships, indexes, efficient queries and automatic backup.
sectionDescriptions.others: Additional features, special integrations and complementary resources that enrich the user experience.

skills.title: Skills & Experience
skills.subtitle: Technologies I master and my professional journey

experienceData.description: Technical Support, serving public agencies in the municipality regarding information technology.

Development of educational projects, challenge platforms and Web3 systems. Acting as a mentor, performing code reviews, assisting with software architecture and guiding new fellows. Participation in award-winning hackathons.
Specialized technical support for various software that the company develops.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Learn a little more about my journey and passions
about.bio1: Full-Stack Developer with 2 years of experience, specialized in creating impactful digital solutions using modern technologies and Web3. Currently studying the 3rd year of ADS, focused on scalable architectures and blockchain development.
about.bio2: My journey includes projects with Node.js, NestJS, Next.js, React, TypeScript and Solidity. I participated in hackathons like ETH Latam 2025, achieving 4th place with the GreenLoop project, an on-chain recycling platform. I also acted as a mentor at DevFellowship, helping other devs with code reviews, architecture and best practices.
about.bio3: Experience with smart contracts (ERC-20, ERC-721), Web3 integration, infrastructure (Docker, VPS, Judge0), and development of educational platforms. Always seeking to evolve and contribute to the dev community.
about.currentFocusDescription: Finishing the ADS course and specializing in scalable architectures and modern full-stack development.

passion.title: Passion for Technology
passion.description: Always seeking to learn new technologies and apply best development practices, passionate about AI and after mastering 100% modern full-stack, I will seek more specialization in AI.

teamwork.title: Teamwork
teamwork.description: Experience in collaborative projects using agile methodologies, Git/GitHub for versioning and communication tools like Discord and Slack.

learning.title: Continuous Learning
learning.description: Always seeking to stay updated with the latest market trends and technologies, participating in communities and online courses.

evolution.title: Constant Evolution
evolution.description: Studying ADS and always seeking to specialize in new technologies and frameworks, improving my skills and knowledge.

devfellowship.title: DevFellowship

passion.title: Passion for Programming
passion.description: It was at Devfellowship that I discovered my true passion for programming. The community showed me that programming goes beyond code - it's about solving real problems.

learning.title: Continuous Learning
learning.description: With each project, challenge and mentorship, I grow as a developer. Devfellowship taught me that learning never stops in technology.

communityWelcoming.title: Welcoming Community
communityWelcoming.description: I found at Devfellowship not only technical knowledge, but a family of developers who always support me and inspire me to be better.

devfellowship.companyDescription: Devfellowship develops solutions and software for large companies. Specialized in AI, webapps and scalable architectures, Devfellowship is a startup that transforms ideas into reality, if you want to know more, click the button below.

availability.description: I'm always available to discuss projects, opportunities or just exchange ideas about technology.

footer.description: Full-Stack Developer passionate about creating innovative and functional digital solutions.

skillEvals.description: Developer challenges platform, where devs must challenge themselves regarding courses linked to the DevfellowshipAcademy course platform.
skillEvals.longDescription: Developer challenges platform, where devs must challenge themselves regarding courses linked to the DevfellowshipAcademy course platform. With screens for Mentorship, Administrators, everything well organized. Uses Judge0 as compilation API. Integrated as a mini app using Module Federation for modular integration with the main platform.

devfellowship.description: Main platform of the DevFellowship community, where developers connect, share knowledge and participate in collaborative projects.
devfellowship.longDescription: Main platform of the DevFellowship community, where developers connect, share knowledge and participate in collaborative projects. Modern interface with forums, events and integrated mentorship system.

codeLibrary.description: A landing page for a course platform called CodeLibrary that will be Devfellowship's next launch
codeLibrary.longDescription: A landing page for a course platform called CodeLibrary that will be Devfellowship's next launch. Project focused on developing the homepage of the community's new course platform.

greenloop.description: Web3 platform that transforms recyclable material deliveries into on-chain tokens. 4th place at ETH Latam 2025.
greenloop.longDescription: GreenLoop is a platform created during ETH Latam 2025 that records recyclables delivered to collection points and converts these deliveries into on-chain tokens, using Base network technology. We achieved 4th place in the hackathon.

talentdao.description: Web3 marketplace where companies create jobs, pay in USDC and generate NFTs as completed work credentials.
talentdao.longDescription: TalentDAO (DevConnect/MintWork) is a Web3 marketplace that connects companies and talents. Jobs are stored in smart contracts, with USDC escrow. When approved, it issues ERC-721 NFTs as permanent credentials. We achieved 2nd place in the Scroll track at DevConnect ETH 2025.

reviewRequests.description: DevFellowship's internal task review system, similar to Pull Requests.
reviewRequests.longDescription: Review Requests is an internal system developed for DevFellowship that allows creating, reviewing and evaluating tasks in a structured way. With complete review cycles, approval/rejection, reassessment and detailed history. Integrated as a mini app using Module Federation for modular integration with the main platform.

hackathons.title: Hackathons & Events
hackathons.subtitle: Participation in blockchain and Web3 hackathons, with award-winning projects and enriching experiences

greenloop.description: Web3 platform that transforms deliveries of recyclable materials into on-chain tokens, encouraging sustainability through economic incentives. I participated in the frontend, backend and integration with smart contracts on the Base network.

talentdao.description: Web3 marketplace where companies can create jobs, pay in WETH and generate NFTs as credentials for completed work. I participated in contract integration, state flow and frontend integration with blockchain. We achieved 2nd place in the Scroll track at DevConnect.
